com.pathfinder.view

Interface ComponentSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, DestroyableSpec, java.io.Serializable, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, TranslatableSpec
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccordionViewSpec, DateTimeSpec, DetailEventsSpec, DetailImageSpec, DetailInfoSpec, FreeRoomViewSpec, KeyboardSpec, MenuBarSpec, SearchFieldSpec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccordionView, ComponentSpecContract, DateTime, DetailEvents, DetailImage, DetailInfo, FreeRoomView, Keyboard, KeyboardSpecContract, MenuBar, MenuBarSpecContract, SearchField, SearchFieldSpecContract

    @ContractReference(value=ComponentSpecContract.class)
public interface ComponentSpec
extends TranslatableSpec, DestroyableSpec, com.vaadin.ui.Component
    ComponentSpec - Defines the methods for all component classes
    Author:
    alexh
